mapper.select: select t.*,m.* from admin_login t,sys_dictionary m where t.loginAccount=#{loginAccount} and t.loginPassword=#{loginPassword} and t.loginRole=#{loginRole} and t.loginRole=m.fieldID and m.tableName='admin_login' and m.fieldName='loginRole'
mapper.insert: insert into user_thirdparty(thirdPartyAccount, QQ, WebChat) values(#{thirdPartyAccount}, #{QQ}, #{WebChat})
